nodes.text: The Seeker's Vigil was a starship owned by the Mandalorian Ash'ad, serving as a fortified vault and monument to Mandalorian culture. In 3626 BBY, the Seeker's Vigil participated in the assault on the Spirit of Vengeance II.

The Seeker's Vigil was a heavily guarded mobile repository for the combined cultural heritage of the Mandalorian civilization, in order to preserve the traditions of their culture in case it ever went astray. It was said that it would take multiple lifetimes to study and uncover all of the knowledge held within the vessel, including countless tomes in the libraries and many long-forgotten tableaus and frescoes that lined its hallways.
